posts.post_title: WTB Some lower grade Southern Leaguers
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave
Looking to buy some lower grade Southern Leaguers for my collection.  Looking for cards that are either raw or graded in the fair to good range.  I have a few but am looking for more.  Email me at t206wagner@yahoo.com if you have any for sale.  Thanks.
